<SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>[COLOR white][makelist.param1][/COLOR] [COLOR red] [makelist.param2] [/COLOR] [COLOR yellow][makelist.param4][/COLOR][COLOR white] -(clicar aqui)[/COLOR] </title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=JHG+[COLOR white][makelist.param4][/COLOR]</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://arenavision2017.ml/$doregex[canal]</page> <referer>http://arenavision2017.ml/</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <regex> <name>canal</name> <expres>$pyFunction:'[makelist.param5]'.replace('>4','04').replace('>5','05').replace('>6','06').replace('>7','07').replace('>8','08').replace('>9','09').replace('>10','10').replace('>11','11').replace('>12','12').replace('>13','13').replace('>14','14').replace('>15','15').replace('>16','16').replace('>17','17').replace('>18','18').replace('>19','19').replace('>20','20').replace('>21','21').replace('>22','22').replace('>23','23').replace('>24','24').replace('>25','25').replace('>26','26').replace('>27','27').replace('>28','28').replace('>29','29').replace('>30','30').replace('>31','31').replace('>32','32').replace('>33','33').replace('>34','34').replace('>35','35').replace('>1','01').replace('>2','02').replace('>3','03')</expres> <page></page> </regex>

select #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Liga ', ['[COLOR yellow]LA LIGA[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]LA LIGA 2[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]PREMIER LEAGUE[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]COPA DE ESPAÑA[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]BUNDESLIGA[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]FRANCE LIGUE 1[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]SERIE A[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]PORTUGAL A LIGA[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]EREDIVISIE[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]EFL CUP[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]COPA LIBERTADORES[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]COPA SUDAMERICANA[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]USA MLS[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]COLOMBIA PRIMERA[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]MEXICO LIGA MX[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]MEXICO COPA MX[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]CHILE LEAGUE[/COLOR]', '[COLOR white]ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA[/COLOR]']) lists = ['SPANISH LA LIGA', 'SPANISH LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'SPANISH CUP', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'ITALY SERIE A', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'HOLLAND EREDIVISIE', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA'] return lists[ret]
